Class EditRecipeActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      ca.ualberta.cmput301w13t11.FoodBook.EditRecipeActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
FView<DbManager>
public class EditRecipeActivity
extends Activity
implements FView<DbManager>

Used to Edit a recipe that is locally saved in "My Recipes"

Author:
Thomas Cline and Pablo Jaramillo

Field Summary
 long uri
           
 
Constructor Summary
EditRecipeActivity()
           
 
Method Summary
 void OnDeleteRecipe(View View)
          Responds to the button to the "Delete" button and deletes the current recipe from the My Recipes list, returning the user to "My Recipes"
 void onDestroy()
          When the activity ends, ensures the view is destroyed so will not get an error from displaying a deleted recipe
 void OnEditIngredients(View View)
          Responds to the button to the "Edit Ingredients" button and starts the Edit Ingredients activity sending the URI of the recipe.
 void OnEditPhotos(View View)
          Responds to the button to the "Edit Photos" button and starts the EditPhoto activity
 void OnGotoMyRecipes(View View)
          Responds to the button to the "Go back" button and returns the user to "My Recipes"
 void OnSaveChanges(View View)
          Responds to the button to the "Edit Recipe" button and starts the Edit Recipe Activity activity sending the URI of the recipe.
 void update(DbManager db)
